titleStmt.title: Natures embassie, or, The wilde-mans measures danced naked by twelve satyres, with sundry others continued in the next section.
titleStmt.author: Brathwaite, Richard, 1588?-1673.

notesStmt.note: "The second section of divine and morall satyres," "The shepheards tales," "Omphale, or, The Inconstant shepheardesse," and "His odes, or, Philomels tears" each has special t.p.
Place of publication suggested by NUC pre-1956 imprints.
Reproduction of original in the Harvard University Library.
